request:
update path prefix regex patterns for left/right viewer naming

## Problem
Manual node expansion was failing due to incorrect path prefix handling.
The regex patterns were still using the old viewer1/viewer2 naming convention
instead of the new left/right naming, causing malformed ViewerPath generation.

## Root Cause
- JsonViewerSyncContext: `/^root_viewer\d+_/` regex didn't match `root_left_` paths
- PathConverter: `/^root_(viewer\d+)_/` regex didn't match new viewer naming
- This caused double prefixing: `left_root_left_root.path` instead of `left_root.path`

## Solution
- Updated JsonViewerSyncContext regex: `/^root_(left < /dev/null | right)_/`
- Updated PathConverter regex: `/^root_(left|right)_/`
- Updated interface comments to reflect "left"/"right" examples
